pages.text: An ocean of infinite possibilities lies within $(item)sapphire$(), literally. It is found underground at around the same depths as the other gems.$(br2)Holding it in my hands feels unlike any mineral Iâ€™ve held before, seeming to be a solid in form but a liquid in sensation.

That may explain why it seems to be more concentrated in caves with close proximity to large bodies of water.$(br2)Armor forged from this material seems to bestow almost amphibious qualities, as I was able to $(thing)hold my breath$() for extended periods of time underwater, and $(thing)extract materials without the weight of the ocean holding me back$().
Wearing this armor also grants me a strange sense of fluidity, allowing me to $(thing)dodge as if wearing much lighter armor$(), as well as $(thing)move around terrain with ease().
